item.title: Interesting feature with parsing XML with jQuery on Safari
item.description: Interesting results on parsing XML with jQuery on current versions of various browsers.

item.title: Referring to JavaScript documentation in Visual Studio via reference
item.description: How to add a reference to a VSDOC file within Visual Studio for improved Intellisense.

item.title: Tutorial: ASP.NET (C#) WCF WebHttp service with jQuery: Part 3 - Pulling JSON with jQuery
item.description: In this tutorial, leading up to a WCF WebHttp service that can be queried with jQuery, we complete our tutorial by modifying the WCF service to return JSON data to jQuery requests, and output that information to users.

item.title: Tutorial: ASP.NET (C#) WCF WebHttp service with jQuery: Table of Contents
item.description: In the next week I'll be writing a tutorial on creating a RESTful Web service that can be consumed by jQuery and returns loan payoff information.

item.title: jQuery: Query an Xml document and output data
item.description: jQuery to pull data from an Xml file, and add it to the page.

item.title: My first, working, piece of jQuery
item.description: The first piece of jQuery that I wrote. Woohoo.
